name: Bee The Warrior
description:
Bee The Warrior - It's a short game that runs from 30 minutes - 1 hour.  You are a warrior who kills mobs to reach your own goals, but it is worth considering. 

Controls: 

features:

  •  lovely graphics
  •  2 endings
  •  collectable items and achievements
  •  pleasant soundtracks and sounds
  •  infinity score mode
  •  gamepad support
  •  boss
  •  map with different levels
  •  dialogues

Code, graphics, sounds by 0x3.

Music by Acid Gard3n & 0x3.
